title: Game Loading - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Psychological   Romance   Sci-fi   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Angels   Animal Characteristics   Beastkin   Butlers   Character Growth   Cheats   Cute Protagonist   Dark   Demon Lord   Determined Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Evil Gods   Game Elements   Godly Powers   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lucky Protagonist   Male Yandere   Marriage   Misunderstandings   Multiple Identities   Mythical Beasts   Older Love Interests   Persistent Love Interests   Pets   Possessive Characters   Power Couple   Royalty   Strong Love Interests   Student-Teacher Relationship   Succubus   Survival Game   System Administrator   Time Loop   Time Paradox   Transmigration   Unconditional Love   Unlimited Flow   Vampires   Weak to Strong   Zombies
author: Long Qi   龙柒
description:
Xie Xi was someone with luck off the charts! The advantage was that any game could be easily cleared. The disadvantage was that all games were boring! Then one day, the words ‘Game loading’ appeared in front of his eyes and he began to clear real games!

The emperor of luck ran into a bottleneck in the first game.

Game Name: Love to the Left or Right

The vampire prince has invited you to a meal. Will you go?

Xie Xi: I won’t go.

Arrow through the heart. The vampire prince says you can’t leave him and takes your life.

After loading the file, Xie Xi changed the option: I will go.

The housekeeper has cut off your head because of love and hatred.

Xie Xi: ???>
